channel.title: Ok i think i got most of this done but i keep having this problem
channel.description:
i hit compile and it said this:
The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
when i hit run it says this:
C:\Documents and Settings\Compaq_Owner>echo off 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
can any1 help me?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2007, 11:17:12 AM[/size][hr]please help[color=red][color=red][/color][/color][br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2007, 11:19:42 AM[/size][hr]someone please post something helpful[br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2007, 11:44:53 AM[/size][hr]still waiting
